EmailTemplate.name: MSF Confirm Access - TRQA
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Request for Access to Markit Securities Finance Data over TRQA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear TRQA Compliance Team,
Please can you enable access for the below user(s) as follows:
User Information: Contact Name: Company Name: Company Address: Email Address: Telephone Number:
Product Access: - Americas (Data Explorers Americas) - EMEA (Data Explorers Europe) - Asia (Data Explorers - Asia Pacific ex Australia ex Japan, Data Explorers - Australia, Data Explorers - Japan)
Access Type: - Trial Access (90 Days) - Purchase Access
Please can you confirm by replying to this email when this request has been processed?
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
